text: Bastiani may refer to: ==People== *Andrée Ehresmann (born Andrée Bastiani, 1935), French mathematician specialising in category theory *Giuseppe Bastiani (active in 1594), Italian painter active in the Renaissance period *Lazzaro Bastiani (1429–1512), Italian painter of the Renaissance *Monica Bastiani (born 1964), Italian basketball player ==Other== *Puerto Bastiani, village and municipality in Chaco Province in northern Argentina ==See also== *Synodontis bastiani, species of upside-down catfish native to Côte d'Ivoire and Ghana
title: Bastiani
